name: Window Hero Charleston
address: 222 W Coleman Blvd #21, Mt Pleasant, SC 29464, USA

reviews.author: Muriel Sanders
reviews.text:
Excellent work. From front porch to back porch all looks great.
The two technicians that came were both very pleasant
It really was a pleasure working with this company! I would highly recommend. The office staff was exceptional. Exceeded all my expectations

reviews.author: Richard McEntee
reviews.text: Did a great job cleaning debris causing leaks around skylights. Jonah was quick on the metal roof and took photos to show work done. Have used Window Hero Charleston to clean gutters and wash roof and will see them regularly from now on.

reviews.author: Tracie Gunnell
reviews.text: Shane and Mo were AWESOME GUY‚ÄôS!  They did everything they said they were gonna do on the job!   They moved my grandchildren‚Äôs toys inside and out of needed to be removed out of their way.  I really appreciate a good company like this one.  I called them one day and they came out the next day.  I can‚Äôt say it enough!  They were great!  Also they can‚Äôt leave Nate out either! üòÜ  He was a pleasure to speak with setting everything up for the cleaning job.

reviews.author: Katherine Pringle
reviews.text: What an AMAZING experience we had  with the two guys from Window Heroes! They truly ARE. They were incredibly thorough, careful and professional. My job entailed removing all the old storm windows, cleaning the house windows and glass doors inside and outside, pressure washing my house and all of the concrete. I totally recommend this company!

reviews.author: Kyle Hayslett
reviews.text: I am beyond satisfied with Window Hero and the services they did for my home. They contacted me for a courtesy reminder before hand, showed up on time as scheduled, and did an excellent job on the house. One other positive that I want to mention is that I didn‚Äôt need to be home for their team to come out. I was able to schedule my appointment and go to work, then come home and see the results. I am very happy with the work they did and i will use then again. Thank you!

name: Go Pressure Wash Charleston
address: 1800 William Kennerty Dr, Charleston, SC 29407, USA

reviews.author: K Tucci
reviews.text: Clean Command did a great job on our windows. Our tech, Sean, was on time, professional, and thorough. The job was completed with 100% satisfaction

reviews.author: Bradley Riddle
reviews.text:
‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

I recently had my house power washed by Clean Command, and I couldn't be more pleased with the results! From start to finish, the experience was fantastic. The team was professional, punctual, and incredibly thorough. They went above and beyond to ensure every inch of my home looked spotless. The attention to detail was impressive, and the quality of their work exceeded my expectations. I highly recommend Clean Command for anyone in need of power washing services. My house looks brand new again, and I am a very satisfied customer!

reviews.author: Barrie Glenn
reviews.text: Sean and team are awesome! Very thorough, on time and very easy to work with. I called and he was here to clean my windows the next day! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

reviews.author: Jan Malcher
reviews.text: Fantastic job!!!!!!!!!!! Sean went above and beyond to make my 1997 SL320 look like a brand new car. I had multiple other detail companies work on my other vehicles but I'm never looking anywhere else. Sean's attention and consideration of older vehicle sets him apart from everyone! MILES APART! Great job!

reviews.author: Nikki Weiss
reviews.text: Sean cleaned and detailed my Porsche Macan. His work is outstanding, my car looks brand new!! He‚Äôs also very easy and timely to book with. I would highly recommend!!
